mapper.sql: t_id, t_name, t_number, t_remark, t_kilneye, t_dynasty, t_cover_url, t_3D_url, t_cover_url_real, t_bottom_url, t_bottom_url_real, t_certificate_url, t_certificate_url_real, t_createtime, t_uptime, isdelte
mapper.select: SELECT t_number FROM tb_treasure WHERE t_dynasty = t_dynasty = #{dynasty,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND isdelte = 0 ORDER BY t_id DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert: insert into tb_treasure (t_id, t_name, t_number, t_remark, t_kilneye, t_dynasty, t_cover_url, t_3D_url, t_cover_url_real, t_bottom_url, t_bottom_url_real, t_certificate_url, t_certificate_url_real, t_createtime, t_uptime, isdelte, t_desc) values (#{tId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tKilneye,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tDynasty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tCoverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{t3dUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tCoverUrlReal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tBottomUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tBottomUrlReal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tCertificateUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tCertificateUrlReal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tUptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdelte,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tb_treasure
t_name = #{tName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_number = #{tNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_remark = #{tRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_kilneye = #{tKilneye,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_dynasty = #{tDynasty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_cover_url = #{tCoverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_3D_url = #{t3dUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_cover_url_real = #{tCoverUrlReal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_bottom_url = #{tBottomUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_bottom_url_real = #{tBottomUrlReal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_certificate_url = #{tCertificateUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_certificate_url_real = #{tCertificateUrlReal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_createtime = #{tCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
t_uptime = #{tUptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isdelte = #{isdelte,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_desc = #{tDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND isdelte != 1

update tb_treasure set t_name = #{tName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_number = #{tNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_remark = #{tRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_kilneye = #{tKilneye,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_dynasty = #{tDynasty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, t_cover_url = #{tCoverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_3D_url = #{t3dUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_cover_url_real = #{tCoverUrlReal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_bottom_url = #{tBottomUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_bottom_url_real = #{tBottomUrlReal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_certificate_url = #{tCertificateUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_certificate_url_real = #{tCertificateUrlReal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_createtime = #{tCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t_uptime = #{tUptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isdelte = #{isdelte,jdbcType=INTEGER}, t_desc = #{tDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
